embed.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Wetterwechsel ‚ö†Ô∏è
Welcome
embed.description:
Thank you for registering 
 To start, please set a location by replying to this bot with `{{prefix}}location name of place` 
 That will set a center point for your scanning circle for most of the other commands.

fields.name: **General commands**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}help`: Shows this message 
`{{prefix}}poracle`: Adds you to database and enables tracking 
`{{prefix}}unregister`: Removes you from tracking 
`{{prefix}}stop`: Temporarily stops alarms 
`{{prefix}}start`: Re-enables alarms 
`{{prefix}}tracked`: Shows you what you are currently configured to be notified about. 
 You can add the variable `clean` to most of the tracking commands, to make the bot delete the entry after it has expired. 
 See more options for each command explained at [the full manual](https://muckelba.github.io/poracleWiki/userguide/)

fields.name: **_Basic Examples_**
fields.value:
You probably want to start off with something like these commands. One command at a time. Change the distances (d=metres) to suit yourself. 
`{{prefix}}location 123 Common Road, Town, Region` 
`{{prefix}}track unown azelf mesprit uxie d5000 ` 
`{{prefix}}track archen axew gible gabite cranidos deino zweilous litwick lampent riolu darumaka d1500` 
`{{prefix}}raid timburr litwick d1500` 
`{{prefix}}track everything iv100 d1000` 
`{{prefix}}quest silver_pinap_berry d500 clean`

fields.name: **Monster tracking commands**
fields.value:
The command needs to include at least one monster and any amount of variables. E.g. 
`{{prefix}}track snorlax lapras d500 iv50 maxiv90 cp1000 level15`: This command would alert you about Snorlax and Lapras within 500 meters of your location, with an IV between 50% - 90%, of at least level 15, and a minimum CP of 1000. 
`{{prefix}}untrack lapras vileplume`: will remove tracking for lapras and vileplume

fields.name: **Raid tracking commands**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}raid snorlax lapras d500 instinct`: Any variables are optional. This command would alert you about snorlax and lapras raids within 500 meters of your location (or inside an added area), if the Gym is controlled by team Instinct. 
`{{prefix}}raid remove klink vileplume`: Remove tracking for klink and vileplume raids

fields.name: **Raid egg tracking commands**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}egg level3 d500 instinct`: Any variables are optional, this command would alert you about level 3 raid eggs within 500 meters of your location or inside an added area. The set filters require the Gym to be controlled by team Instinct 
`{{prefix}}egg remove level3`: Remove tracking for level 3 raid eggs

fields.name: **Quest tracking commands**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}quest porygon pikachu rare_candy silver_pinap_berry d500 clean`: Any variables are optional, this command would alert you about Quests obtainable within 500m of your location with porygon, pikachu, rare candy, or silver pinaps as rewards 
`{{prefix}}quest remove all_items`: Removes tracking for all item based quests. Can also use `all_pokemon` or `stardust`

fields.name: **Invasion tracking commands**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}invasion d500 dragon mixed`: Any variables are optional, this command would alert you about Team Rocket Incidents within 500m of your location if the grunt type was mixed or dragon. You can use any pokemon type name.
`{{prefix}}invasion remove dragon`: Removes tracking for specified Team Rocket Incidents.

fields.name: **Areas**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}area list`: Lists the possible areas you can add. 
`{{prefix}}location yourArea`: Sets yourArea as your location 
 Admin commands: 
`{{prefix}}area add somePlace`: Sets one or multiple areas where to receive alarms from (areas need to be configured by admin) 
`{{prefix}}area remove somePlace`: Removes a configured area

fields.name: **Further info**
fields.value: See all details about the commands in [the full manual](https://muckelba.github.io/poracleWiki/userguide/)

fields.name: **How far can I walk in metres/minutes? According to the web...**

embed.title: Willkommen
embed.description:
Vielen Dank f√ºr deine Registrierung 
Um zu beginnen, lege bitte einen Ort fest, indem du auf diesen Bot mit `{{prefix}}location Name des Ortes` antwortest 
Dadurch wird ein Mittelpunkt f√ºr deinen Scan-Kreis festgelegt, der f√ºr die meisten anderen Befehle gilt.

fields.name: **Allgemeine Befehle**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}hilfe`: Zeigt diese Nachricht 
`{{prefix}}poracle`: F√ºgt dich zur Datenbank hinzu und aktiviert das Beobachten
`{{prefix}}unregister`: Entfernt dich vom Beobachten 
`{{prefix}}stop`: Stoppt vor√ºbergehend die Benachrichtigungen 
`{{prefix}}start`: Aktiviert Benachrichtigungen wieder 
`{{prefix}}status`: Zeigt dir an, wor√ºber du derzeit benachrichtigt werden m√∂chtest. 
 Du kannst den meisten Beobachten-Befehlen die Variable `clean` hinzuf√ºgen, um den Bot zu veranlassen, den Eintrag zu l√∂schen, nachdem er abgelaufen ist. 
Weitere Optionen f√ºr jeden Befehl werden im [vollst√§ndigen Handbuch](https://muckelba.github.io/poracleWiki/userguide/) erkl√§rt.

fields.name: **_Grundlegende Beispiele_**
fields.value:
Wahrscheinlich solltest du mit diesen Befehlen beginnen - ein Befehl nach dem anderen. √Ñnder die Entfernungen (d=Meter) nach Belieben. 
`{{prefix}}standort S√ºdtiroler Platz 5, Stadt, Region` 
`{{prefix}}beobachte icognito tobutz vesprit selfe d5000 ` 
`{{prefix}}beobachte flapteryx milza kaumalat knarksel koknodon kapuno duodino lichtel laternecto riolu flampion d1500` 
`{{prefix}}raid prakitbalk lichtel d1500` 
`{{prefix}}beobachte alle iv100 d1000` 
`{{prefix}}quest silberne_sananabeere d500 clean`

fields.name: **Monster beobachten Befehle**
fields.value:
Der Befehl muss mindestens ein Monster und eine beliebige Anzahl von Variablen enthalten. z.B. 
`{{prefix}}beobachte relaxo lapras d500 iv50 maxiv90 wp1000 level15`: Dieser Befehl benachrichtigt dich √ºber Relaxo und Lapras in einem Umkreis von 500 Metern um deinen Standort, mit IV zwischen 50% und 90%, mindestens Level 15 und einem Minimum an WP von 1000. 
`{{prefix}}unbeobachte lapras vileplume`: entfernt das Tracking f√ºr Lapras und Vileplume

fields.name: **Raid beobachten Befehle**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}raid snorlax lapras d500 instinct`: Any variables are optional. This command would alert you about snorlax and lapras raids within 500 meters of your location (or inside an added area), if the Gym is controlled by team Instinct. 
`{{prefix}}raid remove klink vileplume`: Remove tracking for klink and vileplume raids

fields.name: **Raid-Ei beobachten Befehle**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}egg level3 d500 instinct`: Any variables are optional, this command would alert you about level 3 raid eggs within 500 meters of your location or inside an added area. The set filters require the Gym to be controlled by team Instinct 
`{{prefix}}egg remove level3`: Remove tracking for level 3 raid eggs

fields.name: **Quest beobachten Befehle**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}quest porygon pikachu rare_candy silver_pinap_berry d500 clean`: Any variables are optional, this command would alert you about Quests obtainable within 500m of your location with porygon, pikachu, rare candy, or silver pinaps as rewards 
`{{prefix}}quest remove all_items`: Removes tracking for all item based quests. Can also use `all_pokemon` or `stardust`

fields.name: **Invasion beobachten Befehle**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}invasion d500 dragon mixed`: Any variables are optional, this command would alert you about Team Rocket Incidents within 500m of your location if the grunt type was mixed or dragon. You can use any pokemon type name.
`{{prefix}}invasion remove dragon`: Removes tracking for specified Team Rocket Incidents.

fields.name: **Gebiete**
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}area list`: Lists the possible areas you can add. 
`{{prefix}}location yourArea`: Sets yourArea as your location 
 Admin commands: 
`{{prefix}}area add somePlace`: Sets one or multiple areas where to receive alarms from (areas need to be configured by admin) 
`{{prefix}}area remove somePlace`: Removes a configured area

fields.name: **Weitere Infos**
fields.value: Alle Details zu den Befehlen findest du im [vollst√§ndigen Handbuch](https://muckelba.github.io/poracleWiki/userguide/)
